text: Avo, Anania kachola kengila muna ing'anda. Abaho, kamwikila makono gake Sauli, kamulongela, “Ndugu yangu Sauli, Mndewa Yesu mwenyego, yakulawilile mnzila yuubitile, kanilagiza giladi udahe kulola mwanza uyagwe na umemezwe Loho wa Mulungu.”9:17 Umemezwe Loho wa Mulungu nhegulo yake ugweleligwe Loho wa Mulungu.
